name: Primary Stew
ingredients: 1 lb ground beef 1 cup diced celery
1 cup chopped onion 1/2 cup shredded cabbage
1 cup cubed potatoes 2 16 oz cans stewed tomatoes
5 t. salt, and 1/8 t. pepper. Simmer with lid on.
steps: Brown beef and onion. Drain fat. In a big pot and add vegetables and water and tomatoes to meat and onion.
Add 1/4 cup uncooked rice. Bring to boil. Turn down to simmer. Add bay leaf, 1/2 t. dried thyme, 1/4 t. basil,
